amendment.description: To provide for metered cabs in the District of Columbia.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2230 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2230 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Levin. (consideration: CR S16200; text: CR S16200) To provide for metered cabs in the District of Columbia.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2230 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2230 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Levin.
